item.title: NVIDIA, AMD may soon start selling new AI chips in China to comply with US restrictions
item.dc:creator: Ivan Mehta
item.description: NVIDIA and AMD will soon begin selling new GPUs made for AI workloads in China to comply with US chip export restrictions.

item.title: Lightspeed backs Indian home services startup Snabbit as the next big consumer trend
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh
item.description: Home services in India — whether it is cleaning, dishwashing, or laundry — have traditionally been offline and informally run. This has often resulted in delays and uncertainties for consumers, as well as inconsistent pay and job insecurity for workers. Recently, however, startups have begun viewing this area as ripe for transformation, leveraging technology to […]

item.title: Founder Sahil Lavingia says he was booted from DOGE after just 55 days
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: Sahil Lavingia has published a diary recounting his time as a member of Elon Musk’s DOGE workforce. It’s a short read — Lavingia’s DOGE stint lasted just 55 days — but it does provide new details on the temporary government organization formed by President Trump’s executive order. Lavingia is a well-known name in Silicon Valley, […]

item.title: Security startup Horizon3.ai is raising $100M in new round
item.dc:creator: Jagmeet Singh, Marina Temkin
item.description: Horizon3.ai, a cybersecurity startup that provides tools like autonomous penetration testing, is seeking to raise $100 million in a new funding round and has locked down at least $73 million, the company revealed in an SEC filing this week. NEA led the round, according to two people familiar with the deal. One person said that […]

item.title: Nvidia expects to lose billions in revenue due to H20 chip licensing requirements
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
item.description: Nvidia incurred a $4.5 billion charge in Q1 due to licensing requirements impacting its ability to sell its H20 AI chip to companies in China.

item.title: Victoria’s Secret hit by outages as it battles security incident
item.dc:creator: Zack Whittaker, Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
item.description: The fashion retailer's outages began Monday.

item.title: GameStop bought $500 million of bitcoin
item.dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
item.description: GameStop's recent interest in bitcoin isn't as random as it may seem.

item.title: Stellantis pivots to Google’s Android as in-car partnership with Amazon ends
item.dc:creator: Kirsten Korosec
item.description: Stellantis told TechCrunch it would be pivoting to an Android-based system.

item.title: DeepSeek: Everything you need to know about the AI chatbot app
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description: DeepSeek has gone viral. Chinese AI lab DeepSeek broke into the mainstream consciousness this week after its chatbot app rose to the top of the Apple App Store charts (and Google Play, as well). DeepSeek’s AI models, which were trained using compute-efficient techniques, have led Wall Street analysts — and technologists — to question whether the U.S. can maintain its […]

item.title: DeepSeek updates its R1 reasoning AI model, releases it on Hugging Face
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description: Chinese startup DeepSeek has released an updated version of its R1 reasoning AI model on the developer platform Hugging Face after announcing it in a WeChat message Wednesday morning. The updated R1, which is under a permissive MIT license, meaning it can be used commercially, is a “minor” upgrade, according to DeepSeek’s WeChat announcement. The […]

item.title: Karat Financial is bringing business banking to creators
item.dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
item.description: Karat Financial, the company known for its credit cards for creators, is launching a creator-focused business banking product.

item.title: Odyssey’s new AI model streams 3D interactive worlds
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description: Odyssey has developed an AI model that lets users "interact" with streaming video.

item.title: Spotify amps up podcast discovery with new features
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Spotify will begin recommending podcasts on its Home page and provide a Following feed for staying up-to-date with the latest episodes.

item.title: Google Photos debuts redesigned editor with new AI tools
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: The redesign adds new AI features, Reimagine and Auto Frame, which were previously only available on Pixel devices.

item.title: Meta wants to open more retail stores
item.dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
item.description: Meta wants to grow its retail footprint, Business Insider reported on Wednesday. As Meta continues to invest in wearables, these stores would ideally help Meta boost the sales of hardware like the Ray-Ban Meta glasses and the Meta Quest VR headsets. These products may be easier to sell if customers can try them out at […]

item.title: Netflix co-founder Reed Hastings joins Anthropic’s board
item.dc:creator: Maxwell Zeff
item.description: Netflix co-founder Reed Hastings is joining Anthropic's board of directors, the company announced on Wednesday.

item.title: AMD buys silicon photonics startup Enosemi to fuel its AI ambitions
item.dc:creator: Kyle Wiggers
item.description: AMD has acquired Enosemi, a startup designing custom materials to support silicon photonics product development.

item.title: Dozens of unsold Tesla Cybertrucks are piling up at Detroit parking lot
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description: A Detroit landowner is in violation of city codes for storing unsold Tesla Cybertrucks in his parking lot.

item.title: Family safety app Life360 adds Tile’s lost-item trackers, years after its acquisition
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Over three and a half years after family locator app Life360 acquired lost item tracker Tile for $205 million, the two services are finally fully integrated. On Wednesday, Life360 announced that the item-finding capabilities of Tile, a competitor to Apple’s AirTag and other Bluetooth-based trackers, are now available from inside its main app. The update […]

item.title: Microsoft starts testing Copilot for Gaming in Xbox app for iOS and Android
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: Microsoft announced on Wednesday that it has started rolling out the beta version of its Copilot for Gaming experience.
